channel.title: Basic client error
channel.description:
java.net.MalformedURLException : no protocol : at java.net.URL<init><unknown source> at java.net.URL<init><unknown source> at java.net.URL<init><unknown source> at loader.openFrame<load.java:117> at loader.doFrame<loader.java:61> at loader.main<loader.java45> ---------------------------------------------- thats my Command promt error when i run the client... Im pretty new to this stuff so any help would be greatly appriciated!:)
I am using : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=646092.0 ( Matrix )
